issues.description: The commented example in Main.java invokes farm.feed(), but the problem specification and reference solution define the method as feedAllAnimals(). This name mismatch in the illustrative code may confuse students as to which method to implement.
issues.suggested_fix: Update the commented example in Main.java to call farm.feedAllAnimals() instead of farm.feed(), aligning the illustration with the specified method name.

issues.description: The problem statement and solution implement the method to feed all animals as `feedAllAnimals()`, but the template repository’s `Main.java` calls `farm.feed()`, mismatching the expected name and likely confusing students about which method to implement.
issues.suggested_fix: In the template’s Main.java, rename the call from `farm.feed()` to `farm.feedAllAnimals()` so it matches the method name described in the problem statement and implemented in the solution.
